message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $115. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very useful. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer but $115 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay. How about $105? Let me know if you're willing to negotiate.
Bob, I understand your position. I'm willing to go down to $110, which is still a fair price for both of us.  Let me know if you're interested.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down, but $110 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $108.  If you're not willing to come down any further, I may have to look at other options.
